title: Rise & Ruin
description: The thrilling conclusion to the Amazon Top 100 bestselling mafia romance, Rush & Ruin…My obsession. My ruin.In a way, Edier Grayson never saved me that night in the ocean.He never held me close or kissed me back to life.I know this because I’ve been drowning in him ever since. Flooding my lungs with the hope of us while the past drags me down deeper and deeper into his darkness.But his enemy doesn’t play by the rules. He planted a demon's seed and I didn’t feel the poison take effect until it was too late.Now, nothing else matters but survival… Because once you deconstruct the bullets, the corruption, the sinning and the violence, there are really only two constants in our world:Life and death.Living and dying.And the jagged space in between that was meant to be our forever.
author: Catherine Wiltcher
